description.narrative: Grants provide financial support for early career researchers from Kazakhstan with no more than five years’ post-doctoral experience to carry out up to two years of post-doctoral research in an institution in the UK. They must undertake to return to a research career in Kazakhstan on completion of the placement.

The aim of the Researcher Links Post-Doctoral Mobility Scheme is to enhance and strengthen links between the UK and Kazakhstan for future collaboration, build research capacity in Kazakhstan and enhance researchers’ career opportunities. Between 3 and 10 Post-Doctoral Mobility grants per year
